title: Inception
synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into a target's mind.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Spirited Away
synopsis: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, spirits, and a witch who turns humans into animals.
